previous.body:
**Amazon Web Services Internship** | May 2020 - August 2020

## Key Achievements

- Architected a React web application to enable remote work by reducing end-user's procurement time by 85%
- Satisfied customer requests for highly available RESTful services after project demos
- Integrated with existing smart card authentication by creating an identity provider
- Reduced administrator overhead by integrating with customer's existing Active Directory

## Technologies Used

- AWS
- React
- Python
- Git
- Windows
- macOS

## Impact

This self-service portal significantly improved the efficiency of workspace provisioning, enabling remote workers to quickly access the resources they needed during a critical time.

next.body:
**iOS & Web Development** | September 2022 - December 2022

## Overview

Find the best restaurants near you! This iOS app and website fetches business data from Yelp, autodetects location using an IPInfo API, and provides address search via Google's geocoding API.

## Development Challenges

Challenges during development were learning Swift, SwiftUI, and Google Cloud's App Engine and Cloud Functions. My favorite features to develop were realtime search suggestions, interface design, and developing the API with Python.

## Technologies Used

- React
- Swift & SwiftUI
- Python
- Node.js
- Bootstrap
- GitHub
- Google Cloud Platform

## Links

[View Live Site](https://next-yelp-shops.wl.r.appspot.com/)

post.body:
**Software Development Engineer** | August 2022 - April 2024

## Key Contributions

- Built React application to onboard many datasets at once, reducing registration time by 10x
- Generated Java-based API from Smithy specification, which included data validation and authentication
- Reduced customer support tickets by adding a service status banner during outages
- Minimized accounting response time by automating expense processing and report deliveries
- Modernized production web application to improve user experience and reduce technical debt

## Technologies Used

- AWS
- React
- Java
- Git
- GraphQL
- Redux
- macOS

## Impact

The data catalog improvements significantly enhanced the efficiency of data management across Amazon.com, making it easier for teams to discover, register, and manage their datasets.
